title: APT / ECHO MAKER barks
description: Echo Maker's barks in the underground reading room

dialogueTree.title: Echo Maker: ""I can't believe someone just left..."
dialogueTree.english: "I can't believe someone just left these matchboxes here."
dialogueTree.polish: „Nie mogę uwierzyć, że ktoś po prostu zostawił tu te pudełka zapałek”.
dialogueTree.belarusian: "Не магу паверыць, што нехта проста пакінуў тут гэтыя запалкі".

dialogueTree.title: Echo Maker: ""This new translation of 'Reál and..."
dialogueTree.english: "This new translation of 'Reál and Reality' is garbage."
dialogueTree.polish: „To nowe tłumaczenie »Reála i realiów« jest do niczego”.
dialogueTree.belarusian: "Гэта новы пераклад "Рэала і рэаліяў" ні да чаго".

dialogueTree.title: Echo Maker: ""University is a lot better once yo..."
dialogueTree.english: "University is a lot better once you stop going to class."
dialogueTree.polish: „Studiowanie jest o wiele lepsze, gdy człowiek nie chodzi na wykłady”.
dialogueTree.belarusian: "Вучоба нашмат лепшая, калі чалавек не ходзіць на лекцыі".

dialogueTree.title: Echo Maker: ""I'll spit in Maurice's face when h..."
dialogueTree.english: "I'll spit in Maurice's face when he comes crawling back."
dialogueTree.polish: „Napluję Mariuce'emu w twarz, gdy przyczołga się z powrotem na kolanach”.
dialogueTree.belarusian: "Сплюну Марыюку ў твар, калі ён прывалакуецца назад на каленях".

dialogueTree.title: Echo Maker: ""Eight cups a day is perfectly heal..."
dialogueTree.english: "Eight cups a day is perfectly healthy."
dialogueTree.polish: „Osiem kubków dziennie jest w zupełności zdrowe”.

dialogueTree.title: Echo Maker: ""I would commit war crimes for some..."
dialogueTree.english: "I would commit war crimes for some real Saramirizian coffee."
dialogueTree.polish: „Popełniłbym zbrodnie wojenne za prawdziwą saramiską kawę”.
dialogueTree.belarusian: "Я б учыніў ваенныя злачынствы за сапраўдную сарамісскую каву".

dialogueTree.title: Echo Maker: ""Don't worry, I'm sure your jacket..."
dialogueTree.english: "Don't worry, I'm sure your jacket will turn up."
dialogueTree.polish: „Nie martw się, twoja marynarka na pewno się znajdzie”.
